thread.title: U.S. Bars Another Albanian Official Over Corruption Allegations

author: Samuel Rubenfeld
title: U.S. Bars Another Albanian Official Over Corruption Allegations
text:
The State Department blocked a former Albanian member of parliament from coming into the U.S., making him the second official from that country to be denied access under an anti-corruption law this year. Washington said it barred Tom Doshi, a former Socialist member of the Albanian parliament, under a 2017 law targeting officials for whom the State [â€¦]
